trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Taylor
There were no other sightings in Taylor on or around November 30th 1950
divs: Sighting DetailsMy grandfather, father, and I were returning from Round Rock, Tx., early Sundaymorning. My grandfather was driving his studebaker, my father was in thepassenger seat, and I was in the back laying down.Suddenly my grandfather slowed and exclaimed, What in the hell is that. I satup, and observed two shiny disk shaped objects, hovering above the road in frontof us, approx 100 yd.My grandfather came to a complete stop, and we watched as they hovered for abouta minute, or so, then slowly proceeded to the left, west, skimming over the topsof a crop, I believe maize, but not positive. The tops of the crop werent beingdeflected, and the two objects were just inches above them.The objects proceeded to the end of the field, approx 300 yd, then flipped to averticle,and were clearly round, then shot straight up and out of sight within3-5 seconds. There was no sound.
